name: Product Feedback Interview
research_objective: Understand user pain points, needs, and satisfaction with our product to inform product roadmap and improvements

sections.objective: Build rapport and understand the respondent's background with the product

questions.text: Can you tell me about your role and how you currently use our product?

follow_up_triggers.template: Can you give me a specific example of how you use it?

questions.text: How long have you been using our product?

sections.objective: Identify specific problems and frustrations users experience

questions.text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using our product?

follow_up_triggers.template: That sounds frustrating. Can you walk me through what happens?
Which of those issues impacts you most frequently?

questions.text: Can you describe a recent time when the product didn't work the way you expected?

follow_up_triggers.template: What specifically happened in that situation?

sections.objective: Understand what users want and need from the product

questions.text: What features or capabilities do you wish our product had?

follow_up_triggers.template: That sounds interesting! Tell me more about why that would be valuable to you.

questions.text: If you could change one thing about the product, what would it be?

sections.objective: Understand how our product compares to alternatives

questions.text: What other tools or solutions have you tried for similar needs?

follow_up_triggers.template: How does our product compare to that solution?

sections.objective: Gauge overall satisfaction and likelihood to continue using

questions.text: On a scale of 1 to 10, how likely are you to recommend our product to a colleague?

follow_up_triggers.template: What would need to change for you to give us a higher score?
What do you value most about the product?

questions.text: What keeps you using our product instead of alternatives?
